tool.name: Cell types - get tool performance table
tool.description: Get performance table for a list of outputs generated by various tools
tool.command:
mkdir -p input_dir; #for $input_file in $input_files: cp '$input_file' input_dir/; #end for
get_tool_performance_table.R --input-dir input_dir --ref-file "${ref_file}" --num-cores \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} --lab-cl-mapping "${lab_cl_mapping}" --output-path "${output_path}"
#if $exclusions --exclusions "${exclusions}" #end if #if $ontology_graph --ontology-graph "${ontology_graph}" #end if #if $parallel --parallel "${parallel}" #end if #if $tmpdir --tmpdir "${tmpdir}" #end if #if $include_sem_siml --include-sem-siml "${include_sem_siml}" #end if #if $barcode_col_ref --barcode-col-ref "${barcode_col_ref}" #end if #if $barcode_col_pred --barcode-col-pred "${barcode_col_pred}" #end if #if $label_col_ref --label-column-ref "${label_col_ref}" #end if #if $label_col_pred --label-column-pred "${label_col_pred}" #end if #if $sem_siml_metric --semantic-sim-metric "${sem_siml_metric}" #end if

param.name: input_files
param.label: Input tables
param.help: Classification tables obtained from multiple classisifiers

param.name: parallel
param.label: Parallel execution
param.help: Should the table values be computed in parallel?

param.name: include_sem_siml
param.label: Include Semantic Similarity
param.help: Should semantic similarity be included in calculation of combined score?

param.name: ontology_graph
param.label: Ontology graph
param.help: Ontology graph to run semantis similarity computations

param.name: lab_cl_mapping
param.label: Label - CL term mapping
param.help: Mapping between cell labels and ontology terms

param.name: barcode_col_ref
param.label: Reference file barcode field
param.help: Name of barcode field in reference metadata file

param.name: barcode_col_pred
param.label: Predicted file barcode field
param.help: Name of barcode field in predictions file

param.name: label_col_pred
param.label: Predicted file label column
param.help: Name of label field in predictions file
